value.title: Google launches AI tools for healthcare to streamline document review, analysis

value.title: How The Future Of Deep Learning Could Resemble The Human Brain
value.excerpt: Just as our brains evolve early in our lives, AI should evolve as we increasingly apply it in real-world scenarios at scale.

value.title: Microsoft is partnering with Qualcomm to enhance AI and ML developer experience
value.excerpt: Microsoft and Qualcomm are partnering to improve the development and deployment experience for developers using the respective technologies offered by the two firms to build AI and ML solutions.

value.title: The Breadth Of Healthcare Applications Of Artificial Intelligence Even Includes Physical Therapy
value.excerpt: AI must play well the closer to patients it resides. Physical therapy is an excellent aspect of the needed growth, as it is a regular and visible part of patient treatment that includes humans, hardware and software interacting within a regulatory framework to improve patient outcomes.

value.title: LinkedIn open-sources Dagli, a machine learning library for Java
value.excerpt: LinkedIn's Dagli, which is available in open source, is a machine learning library for Java and other JVM languages.

value.title: Numenta Demonstrates 50x Speed Improvements on Deep Learning Networks Using Brain-Derived Algorithms
value.excerpt: Using algorithms derived from its neuroscience research, Numenta announced today it has achieved dramatic performance improvements on inference tasks in deep learning networks without any loss in accuracy.

value.title: The Best Machine Learning Startups To Work For In 2021 According To Glassdoor
value.excerpt: AVORA, Codesmith, FairMarkIT, Protenus and Ravelin are the most likely to be recommended by their employees to friends looking for a machine learning startup to work for in 2021 based on each company's Glassdoor ratings.

value.title: CSIRO to use artificial intelligence, machine learning, and sensors to end plastic waste
value.excerpt: The Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation (CSIRO) has announced partnerships with Microsoft, Hobart City Council, and Chemistry Australia to address -- and attempt to end -- Australia's plastics waste issue.

value.title: How Can We Balance Progress And Privacy With Machine Learning?
value.excerpt: It’s helpful to shift this conversation from AI as a whole to the more specific domain of machine learning (ML), and how we can harness its advantages and minimize its drawbacks. Machine Learning is a subset of AI that describes how computer algorithms get better at solving their domain specific problems by leveraging large data sets with which to train themselves.

value.title: Tech News: Artificial Intelligence and the human brain
value.excerpt: Humans have always dreamt of soaring the sky and since prehistoric times often attempted to fly by mimicking birds.

value.title: How leveraging AI and machine learning can give startups a competitive edge
value.excerpt: While AI and machine learning are changing the way businesses operate, startups may still struggle to leverage them effectively, with challenges such as cost and a lack of talent among the chief concerns.

value.title: AWS launches next-gen GPU instances for machine learning

value.title: Amazon EC2 P4d instances for pushing machine learning boundaries now available
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced the general availability of Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) P4d instances with EC2 UltraClusters capability.
